Name: Peach & Apricot Spritz
Ingredients: 25 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.
Review: This prosecco-based spritz is fruity but not overly sweet. Peach and apricot sit brilliantly with the sparkling wine, think Bellini with a hint of apricot.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie's Italian Bars. Spritz history and family of cocktails
Nutrition: One serving of Peach & Apricot Spritz contains 176 calories
